title: Nginx vs Apache: Which Is the Best Web Server?

title: Mongo db, maria db, sql which should you consider for your site.
content: While there are lots of different types of server software, you’ll often whittle the contenders down to Nginx vs Apache. This is because both offer top performance for many different server configurations, and suit certain applications better than the other.
